languages.text: "Неумирающий вручил нам великий дар — тернистый путь, полный испытаний. Что это, как не знак Его благоволения? Мы либо преподнесем Ему победу, либо окажемся в объятиях Его".
"The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий вручил нам великий дар — тернистый путь, полный испытаний. Что это, как не знак Его благоволения? Мы либо преподнесем Ему победу, либо окажемся в объятиях Его".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."
"The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

"The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

languages.text: «El Inmortal nos ha otorgado un gran regalo: un camino espinoso; un destino plagado de dificultades. ¿Qué es, sino una señal de Su favor? Le ofreceremos nuestra victoria o encontraremos Su abrazo».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal nos ha otorgado un gran regalo: un camino espinoso; un destino plagado de dificultades. ¿Qué es, sino una señal de Su favor? Le ofreceremos nuestra victoria o encontraremos Su abrazo».

languages.text: 「不死の者は、私たちに素晴らしい贈り物を与えた。茨の道、試練の運命。それが主の恩恵の印でないというのなら、いったい何なの？私たちは勝利を主に捧げるか、主の抱擁に出会うかのどちらかよ」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者は、私たちに素晴らしい贈り物を与えた。茨の道、試練の運命。それが主の恩恵の印でないというのなら、いったい何なの？私たちは勝利を主に捧げるか、主の抱擁に出会うかのどちらかよ」

languages.text: “不死之神赐予了我们伟大的礼物——荆棘重重的道路，充满考验的命运。这不正是祂的恩赐吗？要么我们将胜利献给祂，要么我们回归祂的怀抱。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神赐予了我们伟大的礼物——荆棘重重的道路，充满考验的命运。这不正是祂的恩赐吗？要么我们将胜利献给祂，要么我们回归祂的怀抱。”

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat uns ein großes Geschenk gemacht – einen Pfad voller Dornen, ein Schicksal voller Prüfungen. Was könnte das anderes sein als ein Zeichen seiner Gunst? Wir werden Ihm entweder unseren Sieg darbringen oder seine Umarmung finden."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat uns ein großes Geschenk gemacht – einen Pfad voller Dornen, ein Schicksal voller Prüfungen. Was könnte das anderes sein als ein Zeichen seiner Gunst? Wir werden Ihm entweder unseren Sieg darbringen oder seine Umarmung finden."

languages.text: « L'Immortel nous a fait un immense cadeau, un chemin épineux semé d'épreuves. Qu'y voir d'autre si ce n'est un signe de Sa bienveillance ? Soit nous lui offrons notre victoire, soit nous rejoignons Son étreinte. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel nous a fait un immense cadeau, un chemin épineux semé d'épreuves. Qu'y voir d'autre si ce n'est un signe de Sa bienveillance ? Soit nous lui offrons notre victoire, soit nous rejoignons Son étreinte. »

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, bize muazzam bir hediye sundu. Dikenlerle dolu bir yol, imtihanlarla dolu bir kader... O'nun lütfu değilse nedir bu? Ya zaferimizi O'na armağan ederiz ya da O'nun bağrında huzura ereriz."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One has given us a great gift — a path of thorns, a fate of trials. What is it, if not a sign of His favour? We will either offer our victory to Him or find His embrace."
